channel.title: Video on Liam Getreu
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Liam Getreu

item.title: NIF's Israel Election Preview, March 2021
item.description: With Israel going to its fourth election in two years we again produced a series of preview videos to explain the big issues to our donors and supporters.

item.title: NIF's Israel Election Preview, September 2019
item.description: After our series ahead of April 2019’s election was received well by NIF’s donors and supporters we produced another series for the do-over election in September of the same year.

item.title: NIF's Israel Election Preview, April 2019
item.description: Ahead of Israel’s election in April 2019, NIF Australia produced a number of short videos to help our supporters understand issues at play, polling trends and the major players.
